title: Persona5: The Phantom X™
subTitle: Role Playing/Action Role-Playing
desc:
《Persona5: The Phantom X》 launches on July 3 at 10:00 AM (GMT+8)！
Exciting launch events and exclusive collabs await!
Don’t miss out on free character gacha tickets and weapon draws!
TGS 2024 Japan Game Awards: Future Games Category Winner!
Dive deeper into the shadows of the Metaverse... and unmask the story of Persona5: The Phantom X! The latest anime style JRPG in the Persona franchise by Atlus!
Story
After awakening from a nightmare, the protagonist is thrust into a changed world drained of hope... And the new faces he encounters are no less strange: an eloquent owl named Lefaye, a long-nosed man and a beauty donned in blue. As he navigates the mysterious realms of the Metaverse and the Velvet Room, and grapples with ruinous visions that threaten his everyday life, he must discover what there is to take from this new world—and all in true Phantom Thief style.
Follow our official channels for the latest updates:

【Notices】
• IWPLAY WORLD (艾玩天地) is the official publisher of 《Persona5: The Phantom X》 in Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and the Philippines.
• The game contains themes of violence and suggestive content.
• All game content is fictional. Please play responsibly and avoid unhealthy or inappropriate imitation.
• Some content requires in-app purchases. Do not use third-party top-up services to avoid legal issues.
• The game supports switching between English and Simplified Chinese display.
